title: Your game in new client says I am not connecting to the internet so I can not connect to game
body: How is that so If I am on the boards posting this while your new client says I am not connected to the internet!  Please fix this I do not want to get a 20 min q timer and lose lp for not doing anything, again.

replies.body: Your network could be having issues specifically reaching the login servers.  Try the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and restore access.  Let me know what you find!
